verbose_text: Because we also observed a direct effect of TNF-alpha on cytokine secretion, we further characterized the functional requirement of the TNF / TNFR2 axis for ILC2 activation by performing cytokine intracellular staining and measuring the expression of the transcription factor GATA binding protein-3 (GATA-3) by flow cytometry.
evidence: expression of the transcription factor GATA binding protein-3
